briefTitle: Self-Selection and Actual Use Trial of Ibuprofen 600 mg Immediate Release/Extended Caplet
officialTitle: Ibuprofen 600 Mg Immediate Release/Extended Release (IR/ER) Caplet Self-selection, Safety And Compliance Study

interventions.name: Ibuprofen 600 mg Immediate Release/Extended Release Caplet

arms.label: Ibuprofen 600 mg Immediate Release/Extended Release Caplet

summary: A self-selection and actual use trial to evaluate the extent to which consumers will appropriately select and use the 600 mg immediate release/extended release caplets and comply with dosing instructions.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Correctly Select to Use or Correctly De-select Not to Use Ibuprofen 600 Milligram (mg) Immediate Release (IR) or Extended Release (ER) Study Medication
